mapper.sql: select idmember, rank_id, is_manager,is_delete, nickname, id, password, email, git_url, kakao_url,instagram_url ,date_created,update_created,r.grade from `coco`.`member` as m join `coco`.`rank` as r

insert into member (rank_id, is_manager,is_delete, nickname, id, password, email, git_url, kakao_url,instagram_url ,date_created,update_created) values(#{rankId},#{isManager},#{isDelete}, #{nickname}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gitUrl}, #{kakaoUrl}, #{instagramUrl},now(),now())

update member set rank_id=#{rankId}, is_manager=#{isManager}, is_delete=#{isDelete}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, git_url = #{gitUrl}, kakao_url = #{kakaoUrl}, instagram_url = #{instagramUrl}, update_created = now() where idmember=#{idmember}

m.rank_id = r.idrank AND is_manager = '${isManager}' AND is_delete = '${isDelete}'
AND idmember = '${idmember}'
AND id = '${id}'
AND password = '${password}'
AND rank_id = '${rankId}'
AND nickname = '%{nickname}'
AND email = '${email}'
AND git_url = '${gitUrl}'
AND kakao_url = '${kakaoUrl}'
AND instagram_url = '${instagramUrl}'
